message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am offering it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects the high value I place on the product and the confidence I have in its ability to deliver significant returns for you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,200,000 is unfortunately above my budget.  I'm very interested in the product, and I'm prepared to pay up to $800,000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
